original_title: 巨乳 はさんで咥える
overview: Professional boxer Takuro who has a habit of disappearing before the game. As usual, he disappeared before the game, and when he enjoyed SEX with Noriko, who lived together, he entered the 7th disappearance life. Takuro, who has a physical relationship with Aki, a fortune teller who happened to meet his neighbor Nei Mitsu, disappeared, but eventually he decided to teach them boxing.
title: Kyonyû: Hasande kuwaeru
